text: Aur wahi hai jisne zameen phayla rakkhi hai, is mein pahadon ke khunte gaad rakkhe hain aur dariya baha diye hain , usi ne har tarah ke phalon (fruits) ke jodey paida kiye hain, aur wahi din par raat taari karta hai. In saari cheezon mein badi nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo gaur o fikr se kaam letey hain
